first.speaker: Generator
first.content: Oh no the moon is awaked.. we can't beat it by just making a simple ladder now.

12.speaker: Generator
12.content: Don't worry, I found some guys who can shoot.. with shots.

13.speaker: Generator
13.content: Just press [color=red]ENTER[/color] when their shots are [color=red]ready and shining[/color].
